column2: "Yo, did ya actually get it? No way! You're the greatest! I knew I could count on ya! Ain't nobody else could have done this!"
"All you gotta do with this stuff is roll it up and light it, and you got yourself a firework, my friend. Huh? Somethin' up?"
"You don't wanna give me the gunpowder cause it's dangerous? Pal, you obviously don't know fireworks like I do. It's all good, just gimme the stuff..."

"Hey, c'mon! Quit pullin, my afro's gonna come off...
Aw, now everyone's laughin' at me!"
"...Ah, whatever. I give. If people are laughin', I guess I've done what I wanted to do. Heh, thanks, pal!"
